Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory245.png'}
{2: 'Dungeon Master Ayla', 3: "There's a crossing ahead..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'We take a left turn, then turn to the right and move forward all the way till the end of the square.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'I no longer see any soldiers. Have you already scouted this place?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "No way, I didn't have time. I just remembered the order when DM was describing the directions.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'RImgBg1DisableSlow'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory241.png'}
{2: 'Dungeon Master Ayla', 3: 'You have come to an unknown, quiet alley. The road in front of you splits into two ways. You need to decide whether you want to go left or right.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'DM, will we need abilities related to "hearing" if we go to the right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dungeon Master Ayla', 3: 'No.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Alright, we'll head to the right.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Using the Help system's bug to detect if there are enemies ahead? How smart.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dungeon Master Ayla', 3: 'Keyword detected. Adjusting the Help system.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "...Tch, don't say it out. Haven't you realized Ayla is just an AI here?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'RImgBg1DisableSlow'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory238.png'}
{3: 'The team quickly moves into the narrow alley, going through crossroads after crossroads with ease.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1DisableSlow'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory246.png'}
{3: 'When they finally get to an empty ground with no buildings, they find themselves already on the other side of the city.'}
{3: 'Teddy throws some fabric to the three rescued members, covering their faces.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "Hurry up, let's go before the chaos spreads to here. They'll paste our wanted orders all over the city.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The three Strike Hawk members put fabric on their heads as hoods, but a pedestrian happens to notice them.'}
{3: 'Before the situation worsens, Kamui pulls down his hood and puts his hands together. He approaches the pedestrian with a brilliant smile.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Oh dear friend, are you interested in learning about the Church of Flying Ramen?', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 3: 'The pedestrian looks shocked as he has never heard of any church like that. He quickly moves back, then sideways after bumping into a wall, staying away from Strike Hawk as much as possible.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory539.jpg'}
{3: 'In a forest about four to five towns away, Gray Raven is marching forward in a great struggle.'}

{3: "Through the Heroes' Journal, they were able to find the home of an ex-hero. After spending almost everything they had, the sage finally agreed to dispel the magic that turned them into children."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Finally back to myself...', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Dungeon Master Ayla', 3: 'Lucia rolls a... success.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I want to move the blade sheath from my shoulder back to my waist.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dungeon Master Ayla', 3: 'Liv rolls a... success.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Commandant, you're next.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dungeon Master Ayla', 3: 'Commandant rolls a... failure.'}
{2: 'Will something bad happen?', 3: '65'}
{2: 'Dungeon Master Ayla', 3: "It wasn't a critical failure, so nothing happened."}
{2: 'Good. Hurry, I need to roll again.', 3: '67'}
{2: 'Nameless Sage', 3: 'I can only cast high-level spells 8 times a day... And I just used up all of them.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Silence quickly spreads in the hall. Lee, Lucia, and Liv all look down, staring at you coincidentally.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Shall we... just keep going like this?', 4: '2'}
{2: "I can't go to the capital like this...", 3: '78'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "But there's nothing we can do right now.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv even squats down to the same height as you. She gently pats your head.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Maybe I can carry Commandant on my back. You just need to concentrate on the tactics.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Can we have something normal?', 3: '83'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nameless Sage', 3: 'Actually...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wait! Surely something can be done!'}
{2: 'Please, Mr. Sage!', 3: '88'}
{2: 'Nameless Sage', 3: 'I can cast a "Fast Growth" spell on you, then you can grow back yourself.', 4: '1'}
